entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
